div.p: The protocol used for message transport
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/message-transport

tr.td: The application sends or receives messages using HTTP POST (may be over http or https).
The application sends or receives messages using File Transfer Protocol.
The application sends or receivers messages using HL7's Minimal Lower Level Protocol.

description.value: The protocol used for message transport

definition.value: The application sends or receives messages using HTTP POST (may be over http or https).
The application sends or receives messages using File Transfer Protocol.
The application sends or receivers messages using HL7's Minimal Lower Level Protocol.
